enb_long_title: UNFCCC Expert Group Meeting on Methods and Tools and on Data and Observations under the Nairobi Work Programme on Impacts, Vulnerability and Adaptation to Climate Change (NWP)
sentences: María Gutiérrez, UNFCCC, introduced the content of the Baseline Paper intended to provide background information and facilitate discussions during the meeting.
Gutiérrez also introduced a questionnaire for participants, to be used to focus implementation of the recommendations from the meeting.
